title: The Godfather
synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather Part II
synopsis: The early life and career of Vito Corleone is portrayed while his son expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Inception
synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Fight Club
synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club with shocking consequences.

title: The Dark Knight
synopsis: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations in Gotham while facing the Joker.

title: Forrest Gump
synopsis: The life story of a simple man with a kind heart who witnesses and influences many historical events.

title: The Matrix
synopsis: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulated reality controlled by machines.

title: Goodfellas
synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and mob partners.

title: Gladiator
synopsis: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Titanic
synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Schindler's List
synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: Jurassic Park
synopsis: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
synopsis: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.

title: Se7en
synopsis: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Saving Private Ryan
synopsis: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.

title: Avatar
synopsis: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, becoming torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

title: The Departed
synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Django Unchained
synopsis: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

title: Interstellar
synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Prestige
synopsis: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate illusion.

title: Memento
synopsis: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer using notes and tattoos.

title: Whiplash
synopsis: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory where his instructor pushes him to the edge.

title: La La Land
synopsis: While pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles, a musician and an aspiring actress fall in love but struggle to maintain their relationship.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman to flee from a tyrannical warlord.

title: The Lion King
synopsis: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Toy Story
synopsis: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Coco
synopsis: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to unlock his family's history and pursue his dreams.

title: The Avengers
synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop the mischievous Loki.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
synopsis: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation puts an end to the universe.

title: Avengers: Endgame
synopsis: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions.

title: Black Panther
synopsis: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his universe and crosses paths with five counterparts from other dimensions.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: Deadpool
synopsis: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers.

title: Logan
synopsis: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, Logan cares for an ailing Professor X while protecting a young mutant.

title: Joker
synopsis: In Gotham City, a failed comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the birth of a criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

title: The Revenant
synopsis: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
synopsis: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his fall involving crime and corruption.

title: Shutter Island
synopsis: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: The Big Short
synopsis: In 2007–08, a few finance experts predict the housing market collapse and bet against the banks, profiting from the crisis.

title: Moneyball
synopsis: The true story of Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's attempt to assemble a competitive team using statistical analysis.

title: American Beauty
synopsis: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's friend.

title: The Social Network
synopsis: The story of the founding of Facebook and the resulting lawsuits.

title: Parasite
synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
Two British soldiers must deliver a message deep in enemy territory to prevent 1,600 men from walking into a trap.

title: Dunkirk
synopsis: Allied soldiers are evacuated from Dunkirk during a fierce battle with German forces in World War II.

title: Tenet
synopsis: A secret agent manipulates the flow of time to prevent an attack from the future that could annihilate the present world.

title: Blade Runner 2049
synopsis: A young blade runner discovers a long-buried secret that could plunge what’s left of society into chaos.

title: Arrival
synopsis: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: The Martian
synopsis: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars and must figure out how to survive until rescue arrives.

title: Gravity
synopsis: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.
